text: @JoshuaPotash "a modelling study by Ferguson and colleagues concluded that in the UK, school closures alone will reduce COVID-19 deaths by only 2–4%." Meaning that if covid kills 100 ppl, and you close all schools, 98 will still die. It doesn't mean 2-3% of all kids will die.
